#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
	int n,a[10000],i=-1,j,t;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n>0)
	{
		i++;
		a[i]=n%2;
		n=n/2;
	}
	if(i%2==1)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=i-1;j=j+2)
		{
			t=a[j];
			a[j]=a[j+1];
			a[j+1]=t;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		for(j=0;j<=i-2;j=j+2)
		{
			t=a[j];
			a[j]=a[j+1];
			a[j+1]=t;
		}
	}
	int ans=0;
	for(j=0;j<=i;j++)
	{
		ans=ans + a[j]*pow(2,j);
	}
	printf("%d\n",ans);
	return 0;
}
